title: Addressing Climate Change Will Not “Save the Planet”
description:
The dismal reality is that green energy will save not the complex web of life on Earth but the particular way of life of one domineering species.

The post Addressing Climate Change Will Not “Save the Planet” appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Netflix's “Farha” and the Palestinian Right to Process Pain Through Art
description:
Israeli officials railed against the depiction of the 1948 Nakba, or ethnic cleansing of Palestinians. Their campaigns failed.

The post Netflix’s “Farha” and the Palestinian Right to Process Pain Through Art appeared first on The Intercept.
